SENT.plain: Cardiac adverse effects have never been reported with interferon (INF) beta
We report a case of left bundle branch block in a 35-year-old woman treated with INF beta-1a for multiple sclerosis
Five years after INF therapy, she presented loss of consciousness, retrosternal pains, short breath and lowered tolerance of effort
ECG and Holter 24-h ECG monitoring revealed permanent complete left bundle branch block
Nine months after stopping INF, no abnormalities were found at ECG and echocardiogram examination
